title: Too Many Green Iguanas in Taiwan

content.en: There's a small dinosaur in that tree! Oh, wait. It's a green iguana! Some people keep them as pets.
content.tw: 天啊！樹上那個是一隻小恐龍嗎？啊，原來是綠鬣蜥，有一些人會飼養這種蜥蜴當寵物。

content.en: But iguanas are hard to care for. So some people don't want them anymore. They let their iguanas go free.
content.tw: 但是綠鬣蜥很難照顧，所以有一些人不想養，把牠們隨便棄養。

content.en: Then these iguanas have lots of babies. An iguana can have 20 to 70 babies in one year!
content.tw: 問題是這些綠鬣蜥繁殖很快，一隻綠鬣蜥一年可以生 20 到 70 個寶寶！

content.en: Now Taiwan has too many green iguanas. There are about 200,000! Many are in the south and center of Taiwan. They eat lots of plants on farms. That's very bad for farmers!
content.tw: 現在台灣有大約 20 萬隻綠鬣蜥，太多了！牠們大部分在台灣中部跟南部，會把農作物吃掉，讓農夫很頭痛！

content.en: Taiwan is helping these farmers. It is spending 20 million Taiwan dollars this year. It wants hunters to catch 120,000 iguanas this year!
content.tw: 政府今年花了 2 千萬幫助農夫，預計要抓 12 萬隻綠鬣蜥。

content.en: Taiwan is paying the hunters to catch iguanas. For one small iguana, hunters get 200 Taiwan dollars. For one large iguana, hunters get 500 Taiwan dollars. (SFX: jackpot)
content.tw: 他們的方式是獎勵抓綠鬣蜥的人。如果抓到一隻小綠鬣蜥，可以拿到兩百元，如果抓到大的就可以賺到五百元。

content.en: Green iguanas are hard to have as pets. They need lots of care. But if you have a green iguana, DON'T let it go free! That's bad for Taiwan!
content.tw: 綠鬣蜥很難當寵物養。牠們需要很多照顧。但是如果你有綠鬣蜥，不要隨意棄養牠們！這對台灣很不好！

vocabulary.preface: 外來種的綠鬣蜥喜歡吃農作物，讓農夫很頭痛。

content.text: 1. farm 農場. Wow, you have lots of pets on your farm! 哇，你的農場上有好多寵物! They are not pets. 牠們不是寵物. We raise the chickens for eggs. 我們養這些雞是為了雞蛋.
2. care for 照顧. And this is not my farm. 而且這也不是我的農場. It's my grandpa's. 是我阿公的. He cares for them every day. 他每天照顧牠們. It's hard work.很辛苦呢.
3. need 需要. Can I keep a baby chick? 我可以養一隻小雞嗎? As a pet? 當作寵物嗎? It needs a lot of care. 牠需要很多照顧. Are you ready for that? 你準備那樣做?
4. keep 飼養. I believe I am.我相信我可以. I've kept a duckling before.我以前養過小鴨子. It grew very well. 牠長得很好.

vocabulary.postscript: 你有看過真正的小雞小鴨嗎? farm農場 care for照顧 need需要 keep飼養

quiz.question: 1. Where are there many green iguanas in Taiwan?
2. How many green iguanas does Taiwan want hunters to catch?
3. How many Taiwan dollars do hunters get for a small iguana?

title: One-Hundred-Year-Old Man Helps Kids Every Day

content.en: At 7 a.m., kids are walking to school. Many cars and scooters are on the streets. They are going fast!
content.tw: 每天早上七點，很多小學生走路去上學，他們要穿越馬路，但馬路上的汽機車都趕著去上班，所以開得非常快!

content.en: Kids, you have to be very careful at crosswalks. Look both ways before you cross the street. Are cars coming on your right side? Are cars coming on your left side?
content.tw: 大家過斑馬線的時候都要非常小心哦! 要確定左右兩邊都沒有車子開過來，才可以穿越。

content.en: In Hsinchu, Grandpa Lo stands at a crosswalk. He's there every school day. He helps elementary school kids cross the street. He wears a yellow vest. Everyone can see him! He holds a yellow "stop" flag. He gives high fives to kids!
content.tw: 在新竹，有一位羅爺爺每天在小學旁邊的馬路，帶領小朋友過馬路，他穿著黃色背心還舉著黃色旗子，非常醒目。

content.en: Guess what? Grandpa Lo is 100 years old! What's his secret to living for so long? Well, it's the smiles on kids' faces. Their smiles make him happy. That's why he helps kids cross the road. He's been helping them for 20 years!
content.tw: 羅爺爺已經高齡一百歲了，當交通導護也有二十年了。他說長壽的祕密，就是小朋友們開心的笑容。

content.en: When there's heavy rain, Grandpa Lo is there. When it's very hot, Grandpa Lo is there. The weather can't stop him!
content.tw: 不管是下大雨，或是出大太陽，羅爺爺都會在馬路守護小朋友，他是個英雄!

content.en: Do you want to be strong like Grandpa Lo? He's helping kids at 100 years old!
content.tw: 你想像羅爺爺一樣強壯嗎？他一百歲了還在幫助孩子們！

vocabulary.preface: 百歲老公公每天當志工，讓小學生安全過馬路。

content.text:
1. cross 越過。
Every day, I see people cross the street here like they have nine lives.
我每天都看到人們在這裡過馬路，好像有九條命似的。
They don't wait, just go. 他們都不等，只管走。

2. careful 小心的。
I think it's okay.我想還好吧。
There are so few cars here.這裡車子很少。
Still, you need to be careful. 還是要小心。

3. right 右邊，left 左邊。
I'm always careful. 我總是很小心。
You are? 是嗎?
Yeah, I look to the right and left before I move. 是啊，我走之前會左看右看。

4. crosswalk 行人穿越道。
Then why didn't you cross at the crosswalk? 那妳為什麼沒走行人穿越道?
Oh well… I was in a hurry. 這個嘛，我在趕時間。

vocabulary.postscript:
今天你學到哪些單字?
cross越過 careful小心的 right, left右邊左邊 crosswalk人行道

quiz.question: 1. What does Grandpa Lo hold?
2. What makes Grandpa Lo happy?
3. How long has Grandpa Lo been helping kids cross the street?

title: The Candy That Made a Town Famous

content.en: Long ago, a woman lived in a small town in Sweden. She needed money to help her family. So she made and sold candy!
content.tw: 很久以前，一位住在瑞典小鎮的女士需要賺錢養家，所以她開始製作糖果。

content.en: The woman worked very hard. She boiled lots of sugar and water. She put in a little vinegar and peppermint oil.
content.tw: 她非常努力地工作，她先把糖跟水煮沸，再加入一點醋和薄荷油，就變成糖果!

content.en: The woman pulled and folded and pulled and folded the soft warm candy. She put a nice red stripe in it. Then she rolled and rolled it.
content.tw: 然後，她把原本軟軟的糖果拉長，加入漂亮的紅色條紋，然後把它們捲成一條條糖果。

content.en: The candy became hard. She cut it into small red and white candies. She made long red and white candy sticks too.
content.tw: 之後糖果會變硬，她把紅色白色相間的糖果剪成小小的塊狀，或是做成長條狀的造型。

content.en: The woman didn't tell anyone how to make the candy. But her daughter did. Now fourteen candymakers in the town can make it. It cannot be made in other places.
content.tw: 這名女士沒有告訴任何人她的祕方，但是她女兒卻透漏給別人，現在除了小鎮裡的十四個糖果師之外，全世界都沒有地方會做。

content.en: The candy made the town famous! Many people visit. They watch the candymakers make the candy. They taste it. Yum! There are lots of colors and flavors now. But people love the red and white peppermint candy the most.
content.tw: 這個糖果讓小鎮變有名，很多人專程前來品嚐，而且參觀糖果的製作過程。雖然現在出了很多新口味跟顏色，但大家最喜歡經典的紅白薄荷口味。

content.en: Many people think this candy is a Christmas candy, but people eat it all year!
content.tw: 很多人認為這種糖果是聖誕糖果，但人們一年四季都吃！

vocabulary.preface: 一位很會製造糖果的女士，讓她的小鎮聲名大噪。

content.text:
1) candy 糖果.
I'm so tired. 我好累.
I need some candy. 需要吃一點糖。
I have dark chocolate. 我有黑巧克力。
Thank you, but I'd like some real candy. 謝謝，不過我想要真的糖果。

2) red, white 紅的，白的.
How about a Christmas candy cane? 來一點耶誕節拐杖糖如何?
The red and white one? 那種紅白的糖嗎？
I love that kind of candy! 我很喜歡那種糖果!

3) daughter 女兒.
It reminds me of festivals. 它讓我想到節慶。
Yeah, it's my daughter's favorite too. 對，它也是我女兒的最愛。

4) taste 品嚐.
Mmmm, this tastes really good! 這真好吃!
It's too sweet for my taste. 對我來說太甜了。

vocabulary.postscript:
你愛吃糖嗎?來一 起讀單字。
candy糖果 red, white紅的，白的 daughter女兒 taste品嚐

quiz.question: 1. Where is the small town?
2. Why did the woman sell candy?
3. How many candymakers can make this candy now?

title: Luke Littler is Big in Darts

content.en: Darts are small, sharp arrows. Darts players throw them at a dartboard. They take turns throwing three darts.
content.tw: 飛鏢是一種小小、尖尖的箭頭，玩家把飛鏢扔向標靶，每個人輪流扔三次。

content.en: A dartboard has many areas. Some have a high score. Some have a low score. The players stand far from the dartboard. They try to hit the high-score areas. The areas are small! Winning is hard!
content.tw: 板子上有許多區塊，每一區有不同的分數，比賽時飛鏢選手站得遠遠的丟飛鏢，他們努力瞄準高分區，但那些區塊很小，很難射中！

content.en: Luke Littler is a teenager from England. He's a world champion! Luke is a darts player.
content.tw: Luke Littler 是來自英國的青少年，他 是個飛鏢選手，才十七歲就成了世界冠軍！

content.en: But Luke has played darts since he was 18 months old. His dad gave him a dartboard for kids. Luke was wearing a diaper when he threw his first dart!
content.tw: 他十八個月大的時候，爸爸送給他一套飛鏢玩具，他第一次玩，還包著尿布！

content.en: Last year, Luke played in the world darts championship. He went to the final game! He was 16 years old! Luke didn't win. But he became famous!
content.tw: 去年，Luke 進入世界冠軍決賽，他當時十六歲！最後他雖然沒有贏，但一舉成名。

content.en: This year, Luke won the world championship! He's the youngest world darts champion on record!
content.tw: 今年他得到了第一名，是有史以來最年輕的世界冠軍！

content.en: Luke made playing darts cool. Kids everywhere are playing darts now. There are many more darts schools too!
content.tw: 讓飛鏢變成很酷的運動，現在很多小孩都在玩飛鏢，專門教飛鏢的學校也開始流行！

content.en: Which kid will become the next world darts champion?
content.tw: 哪個孩子會成為下一位世界飛鏢冠軍？

vocabulary.preface: 擲飛鏢是一種遊戲，這名年輕人玩著玩著，成了世界冠軍。

content.text:
1. throw 扔。
Alright, Paz, watch and learn. 好，你看喔，學著點。
I'm going to throw this dart like a true champion!
我像個真正的冠軍要扔飛鏢了!
You missed it by a mile! 差了十萬八千里!

2. champion 冠軍。
Now let me show you how a champion should do. 現在讓你看看冠軍該怎麼做。
Wow, that's really something! 哇，真不錯呢!

3. record 紀錄。
You missed again ! 你又射偏了!
I know. I'm trying to break my record of losing here.
我知道。我是想打破失敗的紀錄。

4. win 贏得。
Okay, my turn now. 好，該我了。
Yeah, I win, I win! 我贏了，我贏了。
Wait, you didn't win. 等等，你沒有贏。
We have three more rounds to go.我們還要再比三回合。

vocabulary.postscript:
你有扔過飛鏢嗎?
throw扔 champion冠軍 record紀錄 win贏得

quiz.question: 1. What do darts players throw darts at?
2. How old was Luke when he threw his first dart?
3. What was Luke wearing when he threw his first dart?

content.en: Scientists found a cemetery in England. It was two thousand years old! A group of people had used it for three hundred years. The scientists studied their DNA.
content.tw: 科學家在英國發現一座兩千年前的墓園，並且曾經有一群人使用這座墓園長達三百年！

content.en: The DNA showed many people were from one family. There were grandparents, parents, daughters, sons, aunts, uncles, cousins, and more!
content.tw: 科學家檢驗這些人的DNA，了解大部分的人都是來自同一個家族，有祖父母、父母、子女、表兄弟姐妹等等。

content.en: But there was a surprise! The people were not from their father's family. They were from their mother's family! It was the first time scientists found this kind of group.
content.tw: 更特別的是，這些親戚是來自媽媽那邊，這是科學家第一次發現這樣的族群。

content.en: The scientists think women were important to the group. Women made the group strong. They married men from other groups. But they did not go to the other groups. The husbands came to live with them.
content.tw: 科學家認為，女性在這個群體裡很重要，她們跟別的部落男子結婚，但是她們不會到別的部落去，反而是丈夫來到妻子家裡，跟她的家人一起生活。

content.en: The women in the group were farmers. The scientists think they gave their land and other things to their daughters. The women were good fighters too. Maybe they helped keep their group safe!
content.tw: 在這個族群裡，婦女還要負責種田，並且由女兒繼承財產。這些婦女也許還會保護家族安全！

content.en: Tomorrow, March 8th, is International Women's Day. Like those women long ago, many women today make their families strong and safe. Let's say "thank you" to women everywhere!
content.tw: 明天，3月8日，是國際婦女節。就像很久以前的那些女性一樣，許多今天的女性也讓她們的家庭強大而安全。讓我們向各地的女性說聲「謝謝」！

vocabulary.preface: 這座古老的墓園，證明兩千年前的英國曾經有母系社會。

content.text:
1. parents 爸爸媽媽.
What did your parents want you to be? 你爸媽想要你做什麼?
Oh, they wanted me to be a scientist. 他們想要我當科學家。
But they have long given up that idea.不過他們早就放棄了那個想法。

2. uncle 伯伯或是叔叔.
Because of your schoolwork? 是因為你的學校功課嗎?
No, because they saw my uncle's success. 不是，是因為他們看到我叔叔的成功。

3. family 家庭.
He's a video game designer. 他設計電玩。
So cool! 好酷!
What about your family? 你家如何呢?

4. father 父親.
My father wants me to study something "safe." 我爸要我讀「安全」的學科。
Safe as in boring? 安全意思是無聊嗎?
Yeah, like banking.對啊，比如說銀行學。
Counting money is not boring! 數錢不無聊啊!

vocabulary.postscript: 今天的單字都跟親人有關。 parents爸爸媽媽 uncle伯伯或是叔叔 family家庭 father父親

quiz.question: 1. Whose DNA did the scientists study?
2. What happened when a woman in the group married?
options: a. She did not go to another group.
b. She went to another group.

quiz.question: 3. What day is International Women's Day?

content.en: Most chicken eggs are not round. One end is wide. The other end is not as wide.
content.tw: 大部分的雞蛋都不是圓形的，而是一邊會比另一邊更寬的橢圓形。

content.en: Why? A round egg rolls out of the nest. But chickens can lay round eggs. Yes, an egg can be round like a ball!
content.tw: 為什麼呢？要是雞蛋是圓形的，它們會從鳥巢滾出來。但其實母雞能下出跟球一樣圓的蛋！

content.en: Scientists say round eggs are very hard to find. They say one egg in one billion eggs is round.
content.tw: 科學家說圓形的蛋很稀有，大概十億顆只會有一顆蛋是圓形的！

content.en: But the world's chickens lay many, many billions of eggs a year! About 1,600 eggs a year may be round!
content.tw: 不過全世界的母雞每年都會生幾十億顆蛋，其中大概有 1600 顆是圓形的！

content.en: A woman went to a supermarket. She bought a box of eggs. She found a round egg in it! She was EGGS-cited!
content.tw: 有一名女士到超市買了一盒蛋，裡面居然有一顆圓形的蛋，太讓人興奮了！

content.en: She knew round eggs were hard to find. She didn't cook it. She didn't eat it. She sold it! The buyer paid more than 6,000 Taiwan dollars!
content.tw: 她知道圓形的蛋很稀有，所以沒有把蛋吃掉，而是賣掉，買家付了相當於六千多塊台幣來購買！

content.en: Then the buyer gave the egg to a group that helps young people. The group sold the egg too! It got more than 8,000 Taiwan dollars! That's EGGS-cellent!
content.tw: 買家把蛋送給一個幫助年輕人的組織，他們也把蛋賣出去，賺了相當於八千台幣！

content.en: The next time your family gets eggs, look at them. Maybe you can find a round egg too!
content.tw: 下次你的家人買雞蛋時，仔細看看它們。也許你也能找到一顆圓形的蛋喔！

vocabulary.preface: 圓形的蛋可遇而不可求，很值錢呢!

content.text:
1. cook 烹煮.
How would you like your eggs? 你想吃怎樣的蛋?
Fully cooked, of course. 當然是全熟的.
Then I'll make boiled eggs.那我做水煮蛋.

2. supermarket 超市.
Where did you get these eggs? 這些蛋你在哪裡買的?
At the supermarket. Why? 超市。為什麼問?
They look fancy. 看起來很高檔.
They do cost more than the others.它們是比別的雞蛋貴.

3. chicken 雞.
But I think the taste is the same. 不過我想味道一樣.
My mom used to raise chickens. 我媽媽以前養過雞.
Inside the house? 在家裡養?
No, in the yard. 不，在院子裡.

4. sell 賣.
What happened to them? 後來怎樣了?
My mom just sold them, one by one. 我媽媽把牠們一隻接著一隻賣掉了.

vocabulary.postscript:
你有沒有記住今天的單字?
cook烹煮 supermarket超市 chicken雞 sell賣

quiz.question: 1. How many eggs do the world's chickens lay a year?
2. What did the woman do with her round egg?
3. How many Taiwan dollars did the group get for a round egg?

content.en: Learning a new language can be hard. But getting lots of sleep can help!
content.tw: 學語言很難，但是睡眠對學習語言有幫助哦！

content.en: Scientists asked two groups of English speakers to learn Mandarin. Well, they learned easy Mandarin. The scientists made this language! It helps them study how people learn languages.
content.tw: 科學家用一個實驗來研究人怎麼學新的語言，他們設計一種簡單版的中文，然後找了兩組以英語為母語的人來學。

content.en: One group learned this easy Mandarin in the morning. The scientists tested the people in the evening. How much did the people remember?
content.tw: 其中一組人在早上學中文，晚上的時候他們會參加測試，看看他們記得多少。

content.en: The other group learned the same easy Mandarin at night. Then the people went to sleep in the scientists' lab. The scientists studied what their brains did. Then the scientists tested the group in the morning.
content.tw: 另一組人在晚上學中文，之後在實驗室睡覺。科學家們觀察他們的大腦睡覺的時候發生什麼變化，隔天早上，科學家們也對這組人進行了測試！

content.en: Which group remembered more of the new language? The group that slept did! People in the group remembered much more. So sleep helps people learn new languages better!
content.tw: 哪一組人學得更好呢？答案是，在實驗室睡覺的人記得更多！所以睡覺對學習有幫助哦！

content.en: Everyone knows sleep is very important. It makes us healthier. It makes us feel better. And now we know it helps us learn new languages!
content.tw: 大家都知道睡眠對身體健康很重要，也會讓我們心情好，原來睡覺也會幫助我們學習新的語言！

content.en: Try sleeping eight hours every night. Maybe you'll remember much more of the languages you study!
content.tw: 試著每天晚上睡足八小時。或許你能記住更多你所學習的語言！

vocabulary.preface: 充分睡眠好處多多，連學語言都比較快。

content.text:
1. language 語言。
I'm learning a new language. 我在學新的語言。
It's so hard! 很難呢!
What language? 什麼語言?
Italian. 義大利文。

2. study 學習。
But why do you want to study Italian? 但是你幹嘛學義大利文?
Do you plan to visit Rome? 想要去羅馬?
Yeah, because I love pasta. 對，因為我喜歡義大利麵。

3. at night 在晚上。
That's a good reason. 那是很好的理由。
I suggest you study at night. 我建議你晚上讀。
Scientists say you remember better after sleep. 科學家說睡覺之後記得比較多。

4. help 幫助。
Or just bring your cellphone. 或者就帶著你的手機。
AI can tell you what to say. 人工智慧可以告訴你要講什麼。
Nice. That will help a lot. 真好，那幫助可大了。

vocabulary.postscript:
學語言有很多種方法。
language語言 study學習 at night在晚上 help幫助

quiz.question: 1. Who learned the new language?
2. What did the people learn?
3. Who did better on the tests?

title: Planting Cloud Trees in the Andes

content.en: The Andes are the world's longest mountain range. They're over 9,000 kilometers long. That's longer than the Great Wall of China!
content.tw: 安地斯是世界最長的山脈，它全長超過 9000 公里，比中國長城還要長!

content.en: The Andes are in South America. They are on the west coast. They go through seven countries!
content.tw: 安地斯山脈位在南美洲的西側海邊，跨越整整七個國家!

content.en: The Andes have trees called cloud trees. These trees grow at the top of mountains. They are in the clouds! They grow higher than any other tree in the world.
content.tw: 安地斯山頂上有雲霧森林，它們被山頂上的雲朵環繞，比世界上任何的樹都要高!

content.en: Cloud trees are like sponges. They take in water from clouds and rivers of ice. Then the water from the trees slowly goes into small rivers. Small rivers go to the Amazon River.
content.tw: 雲霧森林像海綿一樣，會吸收雲朵和冰川裡的水，這些樹也會將水排進小河川裡，最後流到亞馬遜河。

content.en: Years ago, the Andes had huge forests of cloud trees. Many forests have been cut down. But cloud trees put water into rivers and stop floods. People, plants, and animals need these trees.
content.tw: 幾年前，安地斯山有一整片的雲霧森林，後來很多樹被砍下來。但這些樹很重要，它們會將水注入河川，還可以防止大洪水。

content.en: Now, some local people are planting cloud trees in the Andes. They want to keep the place they live and the people they love safe.
content.tw: 現在，當地的居民正在安地斯山脈上種植更多樹，希望重建雲霧森林，這樣也可以保障附近居民的安全。

content.en: Today is Arbor Day, a day about trees. New cloud trees in the Andes is great Arbor Day news!
content.tw: 今天是植樹節，一個關於樹木的日子。安地斯山脈新種植的雲霧樹是植樹節的好消息！

vocabulary.preface: 南美洲安地斯山脈高大的樹木，有水土保持的功能。

content.text:
1. huge 巨大的。
Whoa! This tree is huge! 喔，這棵樹可真大!
I bet it's one thousand years old. 我猜它有一千年了。
It says here that it's 1,500 years old. 這裡說它有一千五百年。

2. forest 森林。
It must be the biggest tree in this forest. 它一定是這座森林裡面最大的樹。
It shouldn't be too hard to climb up. 爬上去應該不難。

3. top 頂端。
Don't even think about it, Nancy. 想都不要想，南西。
You forgot how you fell last time? 你忘了上次怎麼摔下來的?
But I did get to the top of the tree! 不過我確實有爬到樹頂。

4. stop 停。
And I'm going to try it again this time. 我這次還要再試一次。
Hey, stop, Nancy! 停下來，南西!
You can't climb this tree! It's protected. 你不能爬這棵樹! 它是受保護的。

vocabulary.postscript:
今天的單字你記住了嗎?
huge巨大的 forest森林 top頂端 stop停

quiz.question: 1. Where are the Andes?
2. How long are the Andes?
3. Where do small rivers in the Andes go to?

title: A Train Turned Into a Bakery!

content.en: In Kaohsiung, a baker sold bread online. Many people liked her bread. But she wanted to try something new. Now, she has a bakery and cafe on an old train!
content.tw: 在高雄，有一位麵包師傅在網路上賣麵包，很受歡迎，但她想試試新的東西，現在，她在老火車上開了自己的麵包店！

content.en: This train is in Hamasen Railway Cultural Park. The park has many cool old trains. Lots of people go there to see the trains. Now they can eat delicious bread in the bakery too!
content.tw: 這節火車在高雄的哈瑪星鐵道園區，那裡有很多很酷的火車，吸引很多遊客，現在遊客還能享用好吃的麵包！

content.en: The bakery is very long. One part is for selling bread. One part is for people who buy bread. It has tables and chairs. People can sit down and eat.
content.tw: 這是一間很長的麵包店，一部份是賣麵包的地方，另一部份則有桌椅，讓買麵包的客人坐著享用。

content.en: The train is from the Lingang Line. It carried supplies a long time ago. Now it is a place for snacks and relaxing! Everyone loves the new bakery. It's fun and different!
content.tw: 火車很久以前在臨港線行駛，用來載貨物，現在則成為享用麵包和放鬆的地方，大家都很喜歡！

content.en: Other trains have been changed too. They are all part of the railway park. People can see the outside and inside of the trains!
content.tw: 其他的火車也被改造成不同的樣子，在鐵道園區都可以參觀哦！

content.en: If you visit Kaohsiung, you can go to this bakery train. You can also enjoy the park and learn about trains. It's a fun place to visit!
content.tw: 如果你造訪高雄，可以去這個麵包火車。你也可以享受公園並了解火車。這是個好玩的地方！

vocabulary.preface: 火車麵包店這個新點子，很受歡迎。

content.text:
1. train 火車。
Isn't it a great idea? 這可不是個好主意?
To enjoy some snacks on a train? 在火車上享用點心?
It's great, but I hope the train will go somewhere.
是很好，但是我希望火車能去個什麼地方。

2. cafe 咖啡館。
You mean on a real train? 你是說真正的火車?
Yeah, I'd like to have breakfast in a cafe on a train.

3. relax 放鬆。
And watch the mountains or deserts outside. 並且看窗外的高山或是沙漠。
Train trips are just fun and relaxing.

4. lots of 很多的。
Hey, there are lots of train trips in Asia if you Google!
你谷歌就會看到好多亞洲的火車行程。
Let's go to Thailand next time. 我們下次去泰國吧。

vocabulary.postscript:
你搭火車去過哪些地方?
train火車 cafe咖啡館 relax放鬆 lots of很多的

quiz.question: 1. Where did the baker sell bread first?
2. Where is the bakery?
3. What was the train used for long ago?

title: Police Look for Who Took Peanuts

content.en: "Hello? Hmm... no one's at home. I'll leave these peanuts at the door."
content.tw: 哈囉!有人在嗎? 沒人在家的話我就把花生留在門口吧。

content.en: In Changhua, a man wanted to give his friend a bag of peanuts. But his friend wasn't at home. So the man put the bag at the door of his friend's home.
content.tw: 在彰化，有一名男士想送朋友一袋花生，但對方不在家，所以他把花生放在門口。

content.en: But five minutes later, the bag was gone! Who took the peanuts? The man asked the police for help.
content.tw: 五分鐘後，那袋花生竟然消失了! 這名男子只好報警。

content.en: The police were worried. This time, someone took a bag of peanuts. But next time, the person might take money! So the police looked at hours and hours of security camera videos.
content.tw: 警察想到小偷這次偷花生，下次可能會偷錢! 所以他們花好幾個鐘頭看監視器錄到的影像。

content.en: Well, they found who took the peanuts. But it wasn't a person! It had a long tail! It meowed! It was a cat!
content.tw: 他們終於找到小偷，牠有長長的尾巴，還會喵喵叫... 沒錯!是隻貓咪!

content.en: The video showed the cat taking the bag of peanuts! The cat looked into the bag. Then it took the bag under a car. And there, it ate the peanuts!
content.tw: 監視器拍到貓咪偷看袋子的東西，之後把袋子拖到一台車底下，把花生吃光光!

content.en: The cat did something bad. But it was very cute! Awwww! So the police did not try to find it…
content.tw: 這隻貓咪做了壞事，但牠太可愛了! 警察當然沒有去抓牠。

content.en: Be careful about the things you put outside. Animals may take them!
content.tw: 小心你放在外面的東西。動物可能會拿走它們！

vocabulary.preface: 警察找到的花生賊，是一隻貓咪。

content.text: 1. gone 不見。Oh no, where's my purse? 糟了，我的錢包呢?I put it in my bag! 我放在背包裡的!It's not there? 不在那裏嗎?No, it's gone! 不在，它不見了!What should I do?
2. look at 仔細看。Call the police. 打電話給警察。How can they help? 他們能幫什麼忙?They can look at security videos. 他們可以看監視器錄影帶.
3. careful 小心的。And find the person who took it. 找到拿你錢包的那個人。Oh, I should be more careful!
4. take 拿。Wait, you took it out when you bought lunch. 等等，你買中飯時把它拿出來了。So? 所以呢?You left it at the store. 你把它留在店裡了。You're a genius!

vocabulary.postscript: 我們一起來讀單字。gone 不見 look at 仔細看 careful 小心的 take 拿

quiz.question: 1. Where did the man put the bag of peanuts?
options: a. At the door of his friend's home

quiz.question: 2. How did the police know who took the peanuts?
3. Who took the bag of peanuts?

content.en: When you study hard, good things can happen!
content.tw: 認真讀書可能會有好事降臨哦!

content.en: In Miaoli, a shop is making something good happen. Did you get 100% on your mid-term test? Yes? Great! The shop will give you stinky tofu... for free! The stinky tofu comes with homemade pickles! Mmmmm!
content.tw: 在苗栗，一家小吃店獎勵考一百分的學生，用甚麼獎勵呢? 免費的臭豆腐和手工泡菜! 哇!

content.en: Why is the shop doing this? The owner's grandma loved learning. But she couldn't go to school. So the owner is helping kids love learning too.
content.tw: 這家店為什麼這麼做? 原來老闆的阿嬤喜歡上學，但她小時候沒辦法去，所以老闆決定幫助喜歡上學的小孩。

content.en: How do kids get their free stinky tofu? They bring their mid-term test. They show their 100% score to the shop workers. That's easy!
content.tw: 孩子們只要拿著期中考卷，給老闆看自己得到了一百分，就可以免費吃臭豆腐!

content.en: Families from all over Taiwan visit the shop. Kids share their stinky tofu with their families. They see pictures of other kids with their tests. Maybe their picture goes on the wall too!
content.tw: 很多來自台灣各地的家長帶著小孩來，一起享用臭豆腐。他們看到店裡有許多學生跟考滿分考卷的合照的相片，也許有一天，他們的相片也會貼在牆上!

content.en: Parents are happy after their visit. Visiting makes their kids love studying. The kids want to do well on tests. Maybe they'll get to go to the shop again... for more free stinky tofu!
content.tw: 家長們回去後都很開心，他們的小孩變得更認真讀書，為了有一天能吃到免費的臭豆腐!

content.en: Do you love learning? Maybe you'll get some free stinky tofu too!
content.tw: 你喜歡學習嗎？也許你也能獲得一些免費的臭豆腐！

vocabulary.preface: 假如你考試拿一百分，這家小店就請你吃臭豆腐。

content.text: 1. homemade 自己做的. I just found a little homemade dessert shop. 我剛剛找到一家自己做的甜點小鋪. The owner makes everything nice and fresh.老闆做的東西又好又新鮮.
2. free 免費的. Sounds great.聽起來真棒. Do they give out free samples? 他們給人免費試吃嗎? Of course not! Desserts are expensive. 當然沒有，甜點很貴的.
3. shop 商店. But it's definitely worth trying. 不過非常值得去試試看. Okay, where's this wonderful shop? 好吧，這家美妙的店在哪裡?
4. visit 拜訪. It's close to the MRT station.它很靠近捷運站. We can visit there tomorrow. 我們可以明天去拜訪. I'll buy you a cake. 我會買蛋糕請你. Oh, can we go tonight? 我們可以今晚就去嗎?

vocabulary.postscript: 請來一起讀今天的單字. homemade自己做的 free免費的 shop商店 visit拜訪

quiz.question: 1. Where is the shop?
2. When kids get 100% on their mid-term tests, what can they get for free at the shop?
3. Why is the shop owner giving something for free?
options: a. To make lots of money
b. To help kids love learning

title: Taiwan to Be Green Fuel Station for Planes

content.en: Planes need fuel to fly. Now planes use fuel that makes the air dirty. It's a fossil fuel. But did you know planes can use new, cleaner fuel? It makes less dirty air!
content.tw: 飛機需要燃料才能起飛，這些燃料產生很多空氣污染。但是你知道嗎?現在飛機也可以選擇更乾淨的環保燃料!

content.en: Taiwan wants to help! It's going to use cleaner fuel. This fuel is made from old cooking oil, wood, and plants. It's better for the Earth.
content.tw: 台灣想做出改變，使用乾淨的燃料。它來自回收的食用油、木材和植物，對空氣比較好。

content.en: This year, Taiwan is buying this fuel from other countries. The fuel is mixed with fossil fuel. Taiwan's airlines can use this fuel mix for their planes that fly in Taiwan. Next year, Taiwan will make its own cleaner fuel. It's trying ways to do this now.
content.tw: 今年，台灣從國外買回這種燃料，把它和舊的燃料混在一起使用。明年，台灣也將自己製造新的環保燃料。

content.en: Taiwan wants all planes to make less dirty air. By 2030, it wants Taiwan's airlines to use the fuel mix in planes flying to other countries. By 2050, it wants planes to make very little dirty air!
content.tw: 台灣希望飛機不再造成空氣污染。到2030年年底，台灣的所有飛機都會改用混和燃料，這樣2050年的天空會很乾淨!

content.en: What about planes from other countries? Well, Taiwan wants them to refuel here. It wants to become a green fuel station for planes!
content.tw: 那來自其他國家的飛機呢?它們降落在這裡之後可以換上新的燃料，讓台灣成為各地飛機的環保加油站!

content.en: A cleaner sky is coming. And Taiwan is ready to help!
content.tw: 更乾淨的天空即將到來。台灣也準備好提供協助！

vocabulary.preface: 把飛機的燃料油，改成符合環保的燃料，對自然環境大有幫助。

content.text:
1. country 國家.
Look at that plane! 你看那架飛機!
I wish I could fly to another country right now. 我希望現在就飛到另一個國家.
Me too! To a place that's nice and quiet. 我也是，去一個安靜的好地方.

2. sky 天空.
I thought you hate flying. 我以為你討厭飛行.
No, not really. 其實不會.
I like it when the sky is blue.我喜歡有藍天的時候飛.

3. next year 明年.
Where would you like to go? 你想去哪裡?
Maybe Bali.也許峇里島.
I like Bali! 我喜歡峇里島!
Let's go there next year. 我們明年去吧.

4. ready 準備好的.
Don't you want to go now? 你不是想現在就走?
You're right. I'm ready. 你說得對，我準備好了.
Give me a minute to buy tickets. 給我一分鐘來買機票.

vocabulary.postscript:
在台灣，想去國外旅行就需要搭飛機。
country國家 sky天空 next year明年 ready準備好的

quiz.question: 1. Why is the new fuel better for the Earth?
options: c. It makes less dirty air.

quiz.question: 2. Where is Taiwan buying the new fuel from this year?
3. What does Taiwan want planes from other countries to do?
